episodes.title: Japan’s Left-Wing Hero… or Just a Cult?
episodes.description:
Today, I want to share my thoughts on the Japanese left-wing political party Reiwa Shinsengumi and its leader, who feels to me like a “dancing Bernie Sanders,” but with his own unique background and approach. Recently, he’s faced heavy criticism, and some people even call his supporters a cult. But are they really a cult? And if so, how? While editing this video, I realized why I wanted to make it. I’ve been following him since 2011—not as a supporter, but as someone who sees him as a person who genuinely wants to change Japan.

If you find this interesting, let me know your thoughts in the comments. Do you think Japan can change through movements like this?

#reiwashinsengumi  #JapanesePolitics #Japan #Explainer
